page.title: 08A PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: Sheuchan Primary today is much different from that of 1862. We now have a new building built on to the old one (since 1958) which gives us many more classrooms. We have a kitchen and a dining room for those who wish to take school lunches. We have specialist teachers for Art,Music,Gym,Violin,Cello and Brass. We also have a school dentist and nurse.We have a hall with a stage and outside we have a huge playing field.In school we have a B.B.C. Microcomputer,four televisions and a video recorder.We also have radio cassetes for listening to and recording our radio programmes.A mobile library visits the school often.There are 263 pupils at present in our school with 10 class teachers, a remedial teacher,a secretary and our headmaster.
